info.name: Atlantic
info.description: FreeFeed mobile, Mokum, FreeFeed desktop - Dark night readable user style
info.additionalInfo: Dark easy to view style multi-platform studied for whom access FreeFeed's mobile site via Web browser. It works also with Myfeed, FreeFeed website and Mokum with different colors and text-size. tested on Chrome and Opera browsers. Privacy box added. Beta release.  Credits:  Aphasia, Bianconiglio.
